Text: Cedrol is a sesquiterpene alcohol found in the essential oil of conifers (cedar oil), especially in the genera "Cupressus" (cypress) and "Juniperus" (juniper).

Text: Cedrol:  It has also been identified in "Origanum onites", a plant related to oregano.
